online.madeofmagicandwires.tictac

Class GameAndroid

  • java.lang.Object
    • online.madeofmagicandwires.tictac.Game
      • online.madeofmagicandwires.tictac.GameAndroidOld
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.view.View.OnClickListener, java.io.Serializable

    public class GameAndroid
extends Game
implements android.view.View.OnClickListener
    GameAndroid Subclass of Game containing methods required for drawing and interacting with the board inside an Android activity.
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Joost Bremmer

    • Method Detail

      • drawBoard

        public void drawBoard(android.widget.GridLayout boardGrid,
                      @NonNull
                      android.content.Context context)
        Creates a board of boardSize^boardSize tiles and attaches it to a given GridLayout. Use only for the initial setup. to reset the board see resetBoard(GridLayout)
        Parameters:
        boardGrid - GridLayout for the board to be inserted into.
        See Also:
        Game.boardSize, onClick(View)

      • onClick

        public void onClick(android.view.View v)
        Specified by:

      • colourTile

        public void colourTile(android.widget.Button tile,
                       GameState gs)
        Colours a single tile green if it belongs to the winner, and otherwise black
        Parameters:
        gs - GameState containing the ending state of the round
        tile - Button of the current tile

      • resetBoard

        public void resetBoard(android.widget.GridLayout board)
        Wipes the board state and makes things ready for a next round.
        Parameters:
        board - GridLayout representing the board.
